name: PsychoPorky
description:
This is a game created for the Ctrus Jam #2, which had a duration of 48h. This is only a prototype, I intend to upload a full version with instruccions and more features. The basic how to play would:

Move: W/A/D or SPACE/A/D

Your mission is to collect three carrots and bring them back to your home, however in this boring world, you will need some special other dimension help. I'll leave the rest to you! Thanks for playing it and remember, feedback is always welcomed!
